Your world is dominated by the overwhelming stench of equine breath and warm saliva. The horse wastes no time and uses its tongue to squeeze you against the roof of it mouth. The palate rubs roughly against your back while the tongue smothers your front. Foul tasting saliva forces itself into your mouth when you are pressed against a slimy cheek and manoeuvred about like a treat. You start to regret your decision while the horse whinnies with pleasure. It wanted you inside of it. It wanted you as its own.

You feel as the tongue slides between your legs and pushes you deeper. You panic as you realize you are about to be swallowed alive, but there is no stopping it despite your best efforts. Head first, you fall over the edge of the tongue into the gullet and feel as your fate grabs greedily onto you.

A wet and audible gulp.

Defiantly you squirm as you are pushed down your captor's oesophagus until you disappear into the creatures magnificent chest. Content with itself, the horse continues to graze, swallowing the chewed up grass to join you in its stomach where you are slowly digested - whole and alive.
1212122.title: Where Do You Think You Are Going?

122.content:
It's too risky to go out into the middle of the field where all of the animals are hanging out. Besides, due to all of the grass that is now taller than you are, you could very easily get lost out there. By staying right next to the fence, you can stay away from those pesky farm animals whom you are to them a bug, and also have a landmark with which you can orientate yourself. This is by far the best option in your opinion.

You start walking alongside the fence when you hear a loud noise that nearly busts your eardrums. A large animalistic shadow falls upon you. Freezing in place, you start to regret your decision to walk next to the fence and you slowly look up. What you see nearly stops your heart. It is a...
122.title: 2:Walk along the fence post

13.content:
The air is hot and the sun is burning down on you. You know that you are in Africa, spending your summer vacation but you don't know what exactly happened yesterday and where you are right now. Something must have happended yesterday evening when you were on your own in the wilderness, taking some photos but you can not remember what.
Whatever it was... it somehow changed your size.
Your actual size must be something around....
13.title: Awaking in the middle of nowhere

132.content: You slowly get up and look around. You look back at yourself and guess yiu're about an inch tall. You've always wondered what it would be like to see things at this size, so you decide to explore the area. You struggle to manuever through the long savahnna grass, and after about five minutes, you encounter something large and furry. You look at the beast closely and realize it is a...
132.title: 1 inch

1322.content: You carefully examine the creature, and you notice the large feline body. From your observations, you know it is female. The great cat pads over to your general direction. You look up and notice the largest pawpad you've ever seen. The leviathan paw then decends toward you. You wince, expecting to be crushed under the lioness's weight. You feel the pawpad on top of your body and expect the worst, but lucky for you, she feels you under her large paw. She lifts her paw and leans her head towards you. You are awestruck by her deep amber eyes. She studies you more, and lays down in front of you. Her mouth opens slowly, revealing her sharp canine teeth and her wet mauve tongue. You stare at her uvula and down her giant throat, and freeze in fear. She then closes her mouth; she was just yawning. The lioness opens her mouth again, but not as wide this time. Her wet, squishy tongue pins you to the ground and covers you in thick saliva. A look of approval strikes her face. Does she like how you taste? A low growling noise emits from deep inside her body. The noise is a result of...
1322.title: Wild Beauty

choices: Will she allow you to live next time?
Or will she digest you as promised?
13222.content:
The noise is her stomach growling.

So, she snakes out her tounge and wraps you up and drag you inside her maw, with her tounge pulsating to taste you as much as possible while she rolls you around the inside of her mouth.

Then, after having savoured your taste for a few minutes, she asks, "Hey, my little treat, would you like to visit my nice warm belly?"

You reply in shock and awe as she can speak with you inside, "Only if you promise not to digest me the first trip."

"That's no problem for me, hehe, I've always been in control of my stomach acids."

"Okay, then. Let me inside!"

After your conversation with the lioness, she lifts up her tounge and allows you to slide down into her throat where she promptly swallows you down into her esophagus.

Her esophagus is only twice your size at normal size and shrinks to push you down into the lioness' belly.

You then bump against something and fall into a chamber that is as warm as a sauna.

SPLASH!

"Yummmmm, you were so delicious, I hope you enjoy the warmth of my belly this trip, because next time, I will digest you."

You gulp in fear saying,"But, I want to live!"
13222.title: Her stomach is growling...

choices: Will she reform you as she promised?
Is this the end of your life?
132222.content:
She uses telekinesis to bring you out of her stomach up through her esophagus outside her mouth and sets you down back on the ground.

Then, she replies hungrily, "I'm sorry, but, I am a lioness of my word. But don't worry, I can always reform you back to life"

You feel yourself falling in love with this lioness as you say, "Y-y-you can do that??"

"Hehe, of course I can, this feline has a lot of tricks up her paw!"

You decide to trust this feline as she wraps her tounge around you again and you hear her purr in pleasure at your taste as you are carried into her mouth again. She rolls you around her mouth and then lifts her tounge up and allows you to slide down into her throat and swallows you up.

You travel down her esophagus with no fear as she prepares her stomach for receiving you.

SPLASH!

You land into her stomach again and feel pain as the digestive acid begin their work on you and you are digested and spread all over her body as nutrients.
132222.title: Or will she digest you?

choices: falling back to its sleep and clement dreams.
1323.content:
You recognize that the animal asleep in the grass is a tawny hyena due to one of your lengthy Wikipedia binges, and it sure does look huge! Probably about the size of Statue of Liberty.Well, you've never actually seen the Statue of Liberty, but it always seemed big in the pictures.

Wait, what the hell does tawny mean?

As you assay the puzzling conundrum, the hyena rolls over to one side, and makes a sound deep enough to classify as an earthquake on the Richter Scale, or was that the Rhickter Scale? You never were good at names.

As you attempt to reeducate yourself in trivial spelling the hyena is currently
1323.title: Tawny Hyena

choices: She really likes your taste and snatches you in her mouth!
She really likes your taste... And keeps you so she can taste you more later!
13231.content:
You stare in awe as the enormous beast moves in its sleep, yawning widely. It stretches, and its big black eyes open drowsily. You suddenly realize that this is a very bad thing, as you're standing right in front of it.

Sure enough, the awakening hyena focuses on you, rolling onto its stomach before standing up tall. For some reason, you choose to sneak a glance between the legs, confirming that this beast is a female. You then look back up at the hyena, and find that she's moved forward so that her forepaws are on either side of you. She then lies back down, her chest landing almost within arm's reach of you as her legs stretch out forward and make two walls to your left and right. You're surrounded now by golden brown fur, except for behind, but there's no way you could escape that way. You just look up as the hyena leans her head down and sniffs at the weird creature she has found.

She gives you a couple sniffs before her tongue sticks out slightly and quickly licks you. You're pushed back by the muscle, and fall over onto your behind, looking up with some fear at the enormous furred beast. She returns your gaze, pondering your taste. Suddenly, she leans in and sticks her tongue out again. The tongue pushes into you, forcing you to lie back on the ground, and slowly runs over you. You're coated in slobber, and splutter as some of it gets in your mouth. The hyena doesn't let you recover, though, and licks you again and again, the hot and slimy tongue bigger than our body pushing into you and pressing you into the ground, rubbing up against your front and face repeatedly.

She keeps this up for a while, and you can't do anything but lie there and let her have her way with you. You're afraid that, at any moment, she'll simply lap you up and take you into her maw to be eaten. Luckily, she doesn't do this, and eventually stops licking you. You look up, weak from the experience of being repeatedly licked by a tongue bigger than you, and remain immobile as you wait for the beast to make her next move. You know that you should flee, but you know it wouldn't do any good, so you stay still and wait...
13231.title: The hyena awakens

133.content: You were exactly 1/4 of an inch. This was a scary experience. You were so small any animal you encountered would be the size of a city. Before you can wrap your head around this situation, you're forced to run behind a rock and hide because you hear stomping, loud stomping. A giant animal was coming. It was...
133.title: a quarter of an inch

1332.content:
As the stomping continues you look up to see a titanic elephant as it trumpets loud. It's truly big. It had to be thirteen feet tall, at your current size, that was more than six hundred times your size. The elephant stomps forward and you hold on tight to that rock you're on as the elephant comes forward.

But the rock shakes until it is in the path of the elephant's feet. You brace for the impact of the elephant's foot, but you get shaken off the rock as the elephant smashes it beneath its big weight. You're forced to run to try and avoid being stomped into nothingness but you can barely stand with all the vibrations. You fall to the ground and then you look up and learn that this is a female elephant and a big one at that. Before you could admire this titanic beauty, you are sent flying by a stomp and scream.

As you are flying you land and grab on the elephant's...
1332.title: An elephant

1333.content: What else could it be to your 1/4 shrunken form
1333.title: More choices

13331.content:
The stomping gets loudly and then you start to tumble across the ground as a big shadow comes over you and you tumble and scream. As you continue to tumble across the ground, you see a large toenail the size of a small hill to you attached to a grayish purple wall. "What is that?" you ask. Then you hear a grunt and look up and gasp. Right above you was a giant hippopotamus and you were only 1/4 of an inch tall. This hippo was practically a continent. You look up and see the hippo yawn as it opens its mouth and shows you its skyscraper sized fangs.

The hippo stomps forward and you're forced to run before the hippo stops moving. You're behind several blades of grass as big as trees at your current height. and you pant heavily as you look up at the fat titan. The hippo continues to grunt and you're in shock at how big it was. This hippo was large and fat even for a hippopotamus. From what little you can see, this hippo looked female. Don't ask how you knew that. Suddenly you fell tremors and you see the hippo is directly above you and it's about to...
13331.title: Hippopotamus

choices: For Some Reason You Aren't Digested
133311.content:
The hippo let out a grunt and opened her mouth wide, showing off large fangs as big as skyscrapers. As you look up, you see that the hippo's city-sized mouth was coming down in your direction. Being 1/4 of an inch tall, just one of those canine teeth was a monument to you. Then you remember something and gasp. You're in a forest of blades of grass that were much bigger than you. Hippos eat blades of grass. The hippopotamus was grazing... and you were caught up in her meal. You scream as the jaws come down and run through the jungle of tree-sized blades of grass as one by one a handful of this jungle is scooped up into the mouth of the giant and swallowed into the black hole leading to the hippo's stomach. You even see some roots that get slurped up. That hippo was hungry and she was sucking up everything she could into her titanically obese belly.

Just when it looked like you were in the clear, you trip on a pebble and yell. You grunt and roll across the dirt and land in some tree-sized blades of grass. You try to get up but your foot is caught in a root. You grunt and try to pull yourself free but at this point it's too late as the hippo lowers her jaws to eat the next mouthful of grass. You scream as the jaws snap up the grass and you're sucked into the hippo's mouth. You look around and scream in panic a few times as you see the mouth closing. You try to run and reach it but keep tripping on blades of grass covered in hippo drool. "This can't be!" you thought to yourself. "It can't end like this! First I get shrunk to 1/4 of an inch, find out I'm in Africa and now I'm being eaten by a female hippopotamus!"

You yell and scream as you slip on a root and land face first on the hippo's tongue. The hippopotamus titaness then grunts. She pauses chewing and moves her tongue around. You hold on tight and scream as the hippo presses you against her gums. You climb up as her teeth close, not wanting to be crushed into paste. Then, you feel the tongue moving forward and see a light appearing. YES! The hippo is opening her mouth. Maybe you can get out of here." The hippo indeed sticks her tongue out and you see the light and the plains and then turn around and... wait, why is the hippo staring her beady eyes down onto you? The hippo stares at you standing atop a mountain of chewed up and saliva covered grass and you look in fear as she grunts a few times and then suddenly, SLURP!

You look around and see the hippo has sucked you back into her mouth. "Huh!? Wait! No! You're supposed to spit me out!" You then yell because you feel the mouth shifting and the tongue becoming a slope as you start to slide down. You desperately try to cling on. That's when it hit you. The hippo only opened her mouth to get a good look at you. She enjoyed your taste and wanted to know what she was eating so she could look for more. Upon that horrid realization, you scream and try to climb the tongue but slip on some grass and can only yell as you plummet down to the hippo's throat.

As the hippo gulps, a tiny bulge no bigger than a grain of rice appears traveling down her neck. That bulge is you and you scream as you tumble and land with a splash in the hippo's stomach. Once you've reached your destination, the hippopotamus lets out a loud and satisfied burp that shakes her stomach up and then lets out an even louder and more satisfied fart that forces you to cover your ears to avoid going deaf. Then it hits you. You were trapped in the stomach of a giant hippopotamus. Outside, the hippo grunts happily and licks her lips. She didn't know exactly what creature she swallowed but she would be sure that if she saw a tiny creature like you ever again, it was going in her belly.

As for you...
133311.title: Being Swallowed

13333.content:
A wild Other appears!

Prepare to dual the Other in the Plexiphantom Ad-hoc Lipid Dissension Dimension!

The Other uses 'Hypothetical Clout'!

It's Super Effective!

This is kinda stupid!
13333.title: Encounter!

14.content: You groan as you wake up...ON A LEAF THE SIZE OF YOUR BED!!! looking around you see that you are in the Amazon Rain-forest. With that problem solved you need to find out just how tall you are.
14.title: somewhere in a jungle

15.content: ...somewhere very strange! It looks like
15.title: *other location*

151.content: You look around and see nothing more than acres and acres of sand. You couldn't believe it. You couldn't tell if this was an African or American desert. As you walk forward, you look up in shock at a desert flower, a desert flower that looked much bigger than you. Then it hit you. You had shrunk. You were now...
151.title: A desert!

1542.content:
You had come down to the marshlands to look at the local wildlife and study the food chains. But now that you've been shrunk down it looks like you are now a part of that chain. The grasses are taller then buildings, the waters teaches out for ever like the ocean. Walking up to the ruler in you study kit you see your only...


One inch tall deal with the frogs, toads, snails, newt, earthworms and other large insects.

3 inches tall deal with the alligator, birds, large land animals, turtles

1mm deal with larvae, shrimp, copepod, or insects.
1542.title: Marshland

info.brief_description: You shrink somewhere in our world and have to deal with several animals.
info.description:
Ok, this is my first interactive. Hope it won't be too bad.

The content is simple: The main character (you) has somehow shrunken and is now lost somewhere in our world where he might end up as food for several wild animals.


The rules are:

- Animals only. No other humans, anthros, fantasy creatures or whatever.
I don't dislike those but they don't belong in this story which takes place in
OUR world ^^

- ONLY soft vore and no other violent, cruel or naughty things

- The protagonist in this story shrinks right in the beginning where his size is defined.
Dont let him change his size somewhere in the middle of the story.

- Don't write too short chapters. Everybody loves some details and reading a
story with only short and senseless parts is no fun at all.

- There should not be any chapters where you reach the end of story as the only
possibility. Always offer an alternative way.

- Please watch your grammer. It does not have to be perfect at all but well... you
should know the basics :P
